CommitmentSection.headline: Your goals, our priority
CommitmentSection.description: From concept to launch, we're committed to your success with rapid response times and personalized attention to detail.

items.title: Branding
items.description: We create impactful brand identities that differentiate your business and connect with your audience.

items.title: Development
items.description: We build fast, scalable, and secure web and mobile applications tailored to your business goals.

items.title: Websites
items.description: We design and develop responsive, user-friendly websites that enhance your online presence.

items.title: Design support
items.description: Our team offers ongoing design assistance to ensure your visual assets remain consistent and effective.

About.quote: Reem helps companies create stunning and strategically sound experiences that engage audiences. Our experts work closely with you to ensure that every detail is aligned with your goals.
About.description: From concept to launch, we craft digital solutions that not only look exceptional but also drive results, building connections that last.

Pricing.title: Flexible pricing
Pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits your needs. From a solid foundation to a fully optimized solution.

monthly.name: Basic
monthly.description: For small businesses or startups building their first digital presence.
features: Design of homepage + up to 4 inner pages

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.description: We've heard it all. Here's everything you need to know before working with us.
questions: What's your process for designing and developing a new website?
What if I need to make changes or add features in the future?
How long does it typically take to see results from my brand’s new website?
How do you ensure the website is mobile-friendly?

Contact.title: Let’s bring your vision to life
Contact.description: John is here to ensure your experience with us is smooth and successful. Reach out anytime — he’s here to make sure you feel confident and supported throughout your journey with us.

Footer.newsletterDescription: Join our newsletter and stay updated on the latest trends in digital design
Footer.description: With reem, your company gets more than just a website. We design experiences that resonate with your customers and drive meaningful engagement.
